title: Zymo-Research/aladdin-smrnaseq pipeline parameters
description: Nextflow small RNA-Seq analysis pipeline, part of the Zymo research bioinformatics pipeline catalog

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved.

design.description: Path to a design CSV file with sample & group labels, and paths to reads files

reference_genome_options.title: Reference genome options
reference_genome_options.description: Options for the reference genome indices used to align reads.

genome.description: Reference genome used to align reads. Please contact us to add more species.

max_job_request_options.title: Max job request options
max_job_request_options.description: Set the top limit for requested resources for any single job.

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested for any single job.

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested for any single job.

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested for any single job.

read_trimming_options.title: Read trimming options
read_trimming_options.description: Options to adjust read trimming criteria

protocol.description: Library prep protocol/kit used. If your kit is not listed, please contact us to request help.

trim_nextseq.description: This option will set a new Phred score quality cutoff that will automatically ignore and trim erroneous high quality Gs at the 3' end common on NextSeq or NovaSeq platforms. A value above 0 for this parameter will set a new Phred score. Otherwise, a default Phred score of 20 will be used.

min_length.description: Minimum read length for a read to be kept after trimming

max_length.description: Maximum read length for a read to be kept after trimming. Set max_length to 0 for no maximum read length to be applied.

save_trimmed.description: Whether to save FASTQ files post-trimming

comparison_options.title: Differential Expression Analysis Parameters
comparison_options.description: Options to change differential expression settings for isomiRs and DESeq2

isomirs_fdr.description: Differential Expression false discovery rate. Sets FDR for both isomiRs and DESeq2.

isomirs_lfc.description: Differential Expression Log2 Fold Change Threshold. Sets LFC for both isomiRs and DESeq2.

comparisons.description: Path to a CSV file stating the sample groups you want to compare. If not provided, all pairwise comparisons will be carried out.

process_skipping_options.title: Process skipping options
process_skipping_options.description: Options to skip various steps in the workflow

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.

name.description: Name for the pipeline run. If not specified, Nextflow will automatically generate a random mnemonic

tracedir.description: Directory to keep pipeline Nextflow logs and reports.

awsqueue.description: AWS Batch queue to submit jobs to

profile.description: Run the pipeline on a specific compute environment.
